data.description:

The latest update is out from Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA ( (GB:0FGH) ).

Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA is set to announce its financial results for the fourth quarter of 2024 on February 13, 2025. The results presentation, led by CEO Geir Karlsen and CFO Hans-Jørgen Wibstad, will take place in Oslo, with a live webcast available for remote participants. This event provides stakeholders with insights into the company’s financial performance and strategic direction.

More about Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA

Norwegian Air Shuttle ASA is a prominent airline company operating primarily in Europe, known for offering low-cost flights to various destinations. The company focuses on providing affordable air travel options and has a significant presence in the European aviation market.

data.description:

Xometry ( (XMTR) ) just unveiled an announcement.

On January 30, 2025, Xometry, Inc. announced that its Chief Technology Officer, Matt Leibel, would be stepping down from his role, effective February 5, 2025. Vaidyanathan Raghavan will take over the position on the same date. The transition is amicable, with Leibel assisting until February 28, 2025, and receiving benefits per his employment agreement.

data.title: Orchestra BioMed Appoints New Director Amid Board Changes
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Orchestra BioMed Holdings ( (OBIO) ) has shared an update.

On January 30, 2025, Orchestra BioMed Holdings appointed Christopher Cleary to its Board of Directors as a Class II director, a role anticipated to bolster the company’s strategic initiatives given Cleary’s extensive experience in mergers, acquisitions, and corporate development. Cleary’s appointment follows his influential tenure at Medtronic, where he played a pivotal role in key collaborations, including the strategic partnership between Medtronic and Orchestra BioMed. Concurrently, Eric A. Rose, M.D., resigned from the Board to transition into an Emeritus Board Member and Strategic Advisor role, enabling him to continue contributing his expertise to the company. The changes in the Board’s composition are expected to influence Orchestra BioMed’s strategic direction and reinforce its focus on advancing medical technologies through partnerships.

More about Orchestra BioMed Holdings

Orchestra BioMed Holdings is a biomedical innovation company focused on accelerating high-impact technologies to patients through risk-reward sharing partnerships with leading medical device companies. Their business model includes strategic collaborations, such as with Medtronic for atrioventricular interval modulation (AVIM) therapy for hypertension, and with Terumo for the Virtue Sirolimus AngioInfusion Balloon for artery disease treatment.

Thakral Corporation Ltd ( (SG:AWI) ) has shared an announcement.

Thakral Corporation Ltd holds a significant stake in The Beauty Tech Group, which is considering strategic options including a potential IPO in London. The company’s board clarified that while the valuation of The Beauty Tech Group’s potential listing has been speculated at £350m, the final valuation has yet to be determined.

More about Thakral Corporation Ltd

Thakral Corporation Ltd is a Singapore-incorporated company engaged in investment activities, holding a 9.4% interest in The Beauty Tech Group Limited, a UK-based company specializing in beauty technology solutions.

data.title: OverActive Media Boosts European Esports with Successful Call of Duty League Major
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An announcement from OverActive Media Corp ( (TSE:OAM) ) is now available.

OverActive Media Corp celebrated a significant milestone with the successful hosting of the first Call of Duty League Major event in Europe in five years, in collaboration with Movistar KOI. This event, held in Madrid, highlighted OverActive’s commitment to the global esports community, showcasing their strategic acquisitions’ impact on fan engagement and economic contributions to local communities. The event drew over 12,000 attendees, with a majority traveling from outside Spain, demonstrating the event’s international appeal and its potential for sustainable growth in the European esports market.

More about OverActive Media Corp

OverActive Media Corp is a global esports and entertainment company focused on engaging today’s generation of esports fans. The company is involved in organizing esports events and has a strategic focus on expanding its international footprint, enhancing fan engagement, and delivering value to corporate partners.

Mobile Streams ( (GB:MOS) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Mobile Streams plc announced the successful exercise of 12,740,256 warrants by investors at a price of 0.3p per share, which generated £38,221 in proceeds. The new ordinary shares are set to be admitted to trading on AIM by 11 February 2025, increasing the total voting rights to 9,030,919,938 shares, enabling shareholders to assess their interests in compliance with FCA regulations.

More about Mobile Streams

Mobile Streams plc is an AIM-quoted company specializing in mobile content and data intelligence. The company focuses on providing mobile content services and has a significant presence in the technology and telecommunications industries.

An announcement from Jerash Holdings (US) ( (JRSH) ) is now available.

On February 5, 2025, Jerash Holdings announced that its board of directors declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.05 per share of common stock, payable on or about February 25, 2025, to stockholders of record as of February 18, 2025. This decision reflects the company’s ongoing commitment to providing shareholder value and maintaining steady financial distributions to its investors.

More about Jerash Holdings (US)

Jerash Holdings (US), Inc. manufactures and exports custom, ready-made sportswear and outerwear for leading global brands and retailers, including companies like VF Corporation, New Balance, G-III, American Eagle, and Skechers. Jerash operates six factory units and four warehouses and employs approximately 6,000 people.

data.title: Captivision Inc. Increases Share Purchase Agreement Limit
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Captivision Inc ( (CAPT) ) has provided an update.

On February 4, 2025, Captivision Inc. amended its Share Purchase Agreement with New Circle Principal Investments LLC, initially dated June 12, 2024. The amendment increases the Beneficial Ownership Limitation from 4.99% to 9.99% and updates the pricing mechanics, allowing New Circle to acquire a larger stake in Captivision. This change could potentially impact Captivision’s shareholder structure and provide greater flexibility in capital management and investment opportunities.

More about Captivision Inc

data.title: Altamira Gold Reports Significant Extensions at Cajueiro Project
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

Altamira Gold Corp ( (TSE:ALTA) ) has shared an update.

Altamira Gold Corp has announced promising results from recent trenching activities at its Cajueiro Central Project, revealing significant extensions to the mineralized structure previously reported. A notable intercept of 17 meters at 1.46g/t gold was discovered 200 meters beyond the current resource limits, indicating potential for substantial resource additions. The company plans further drilling to expand the mineral resource footprint and test new peripheral targets, which may enhance its strategic position in the exploration sector.

More about Altamira Gold Corp

Altamira Gold Corp is a company operating in the mining industry with a focus on gold exploration and production. The company primarily works on projects like the Cajueiro project in central western Brazil, which is its most advanced, alongside other projects such as Apiacas and Santa Helena. Altamira is involved in identifying and extending mineral resources through drilling and trenching efforts.
